room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: The facility was so meticulously maintained. So much fun for my daughter, grandson and I to use clues to solve a mystery. The employees were cordial and enthusiastic. If all other The Mystery Game facilities are as impressive I will look forward my next fun experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: We had an amazing time!!! I highly recommend with family or friends! We were there with our family and my daughter’s boyfriend. They went above and beyond when I wrote them and email and told them it was my daughter’s 16th birthday! It was challenging but not frustrating as our guide helped us when we got pretty “close” on a few things! The best part is.... YOU PUT YOUR PHONES DOWN! It was nice to have that uninterrupted time with my family on my daughter’s birthday. We can’t wait to go back and my 12 year old son now wants to do this for his birthday! Thank you Escape Room!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Played with my wife and two sons. Most fun we have had together in some time. I will recommend to anyone looking for a different kind of experience. Great staff. Very helpful. Facilities were top notch. Thank you for a great time.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Had a GREAT family time! The staff was very helpful and made it allot of fun! You have to work together to figure out the many clues presented and to solve the various challenges presented.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: Went through the Heist room. The room itself was good, with an impressive design. The puzzles varied with some being interesting, some kind of easy and one in particular being a lot of trial and error. The game master, Gabe, was very helpful, though the store uses screens to communicate which I wasn't a huge fan of. Overall not bad.
